question.title: How can I retrieve an object from an S3 bucket by its metadata value(s)?
question.body: I'm trying to check for duplicates in my S3 bucket whilst processing a file in my Java application. I can calculate the SHA-256 checksum and I'll know the file size of my current file. I can also use the prefix of the filename to denote a file type. How can I use these values to look for a duplicate within the objects in my S3 bucket?
